recipe_name: Poached vanilla meringue with fruit comp√¥te
author: James Tanner
method: Whisk egg whites adding the sugar slowly. Cut and split the vanilla pod.  Bring the milk and vanilla to gentle simmer. Using 2 large dessertspoons, quenelle the meringue on to the milk and gently poach each side for around 30-40 seconds.  Remove and put on fruit compote and serve. Sprinkle the mixed berries with vanilla sugar to taste.  Warm berries and sugar in a pan and serve with poached meringues. If using fresh seasonal fruit, cook for longer until the fruit is softened.
ingredients: 4 egg, whites only,  110g/4oz vanilla sugar,  570ml/1 pint milk,  1 vanilla pod,  1 bag mixed berries, defrosted,  vanilla sugar, to taste
